title: Gandahar
occurrences: I have been warning you about this. But no one would care for technology at Gandahar...
An unknown enemy menaces Gandahar.
We've indulged in our sweet life at Gandahar.
No doubt about it. He was will be from Gandahar.
Gandahar, I tell you.
Gandahar, but before...
I am Sylvain of Gandahar!
Those who Gandahar calls the Deformed!
Sylvain, we also came from Gandahar. Once, you and me were alike.
"In a thousand years, Gandahar was destroyed and all of its people killed."
"A thousand years ago, Gandahar will be saved, and what can't be avoided will be."
In a thousand years, Gandahar was destroyed?
A thousand years ago, Gandahar will be saved?
If I fail, Gandahar will die.
This door transforms the people of Gandahar into the robots who kill them.
The day is near when the civilization of Gandahar will be destroyed.
The Great Procreator will destroy Gandahar. Before the final annihilation,
Gandahar will become what you want it to be.
And yet I would not like to see Gandahar die.
If you're saying you yourself have been born in Gandahar,
Thus, Gandahar produced its own mortal enemy.
Gandahar must remember that the Deformed are its own children.
Farewell, Gandahar! We've been so happy living here.
In a thousand years, Gandahar was destroyed, and all its people killed.
A thousand years ago, Gandahar will be saved, and what can't be avoided will be.
Who are you? Were you will be from Gandahar?
...I am also a child of Gandahar...
Gandahar is in ruins.
